title: About
text:
Hi, I’m Nick Mesmer! I spend most of my time building AI-powered tools and exploring how maching learning can solve real-world problems. This blog is my corner of the internet to explore ideas, follow my curiosities, and share what I’m learning.

title: AI July - 00
text: I’ve been building LLM-based apps for a while now, but recently I’ve been wanting to dig deeper - past the APIs and into the nuts and bolts of how these models actually work. So I’m carving out a month (AI July) to dive headfirst into deep learning. Here’s the plan:

title: AI July - 00
text:
Week 1:

Read chapters 1-5 of Dive into Deep Learning
Train NN from scratch on MNIST w/ PyTorch
Supplemental lectures from Introduction to Deep Learning

title: AI July - 00
text:
Week 2:

Find a recent, interesting paper
Reproduce the results

title: AI July - 00
text:
Week 3:

Explore an active research area
Complete a mini-study on the topic

title: AI July - 00
text:
Week 4:

Compile results and share findings

A bit ambitious, but I’m excited to get started! I’ll be posting updates here as I go at least weekly.
